casebody.data:
Monday, July 28, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

97-1390. State v. Cornwell.

Mahoning C.P. No. 96CR525. This cause is pending on appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Mahoning County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for a stay of execution pending disposition of this appeal,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for a stay of execution be, and hereby is, granted.
